about_the_game:
Collect and command over 25 Heroes to master the lands across the globe in one mighty Customizations pack.
This Hero Cosmetic Pack Vol. 1 unlocks the following customizations:

Aztecs:
Moctezuma
Goddess

British:
General Warwick

Chinese:
Captain Huang

Dutch:
William the Silent

French:
Captain Pecaudy
Fernig Sister

Germans:
Fräulein

Haudenosaunee:
Ka:nien
Nonahkee

Incan:
Tupac Amaru II
Qoya

Indians:
Nanib Sahir

Japanese:
Nakano Takeko

Lakota:
Ogle Tanka Un

Ottomans:
Şahin

Portuguese:
Maria of Portugal

Russians:
Boyar

Spanish:
Delgado

Swedes:
Queen Kristina

Ethiopians:
Emperor Tewodros

Hausa:
Queen Amina

Italians:
Roman Centurion

Maltese:
Alain Magnan

Mexicans:
Adelita
La Catrina

United States:
Amelia

package_groups.name: default

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 18362.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3-2105 @ 3.1GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 973 with an average CPU Passmark score of 1830 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 430, Radeon HD 5570, or Intel HD 4400 with an average Passmark G3D Mark of 570 or better @720p
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 2 GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 18362.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-3300 @ 3.0GHz or AMD FX-8350 or equivalent with an average CPU Passmark score of 4100 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 or Radeon R9 Fury or equivalent with an average Passmark G3D Mark of 9500 or better @1080p
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4 GB VRAM
